ygData.subject: Re: New Patch.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Some people.  Hrumph.  What ever happened to good, round numbers like 1000. ... So now that we have your attention, do you have any idea why it s taken so
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:10 PM 6/10/99 -0400, J.M. Capozzi wrote:
>After 800 plus spells, Geoffrey admits to being *temporarily* short on
>creativity.

Some people. Hrumph. What ever happened to good, round numbers like 1000.

:-)}

So now that we have your attention, do you have any idea why it's taken so
long to fix the bard animation so we aren't all the time speeding around
strumming a pipe when we're supposed to be beating a drum? That's a
pervasive silliness in the game environment. I'm rather surprised playing
the pipe is correctly animated but the skill we probably use most of our
time isn't.

Bob
